verses.name: Judges 10:1
verses.text: And after Abimelech there arose to defend Israel Tola the son of Puah, the son of Dodo, a man of Issachar; and he dwelt in Shamir in mount Ephraim.

verses.name: Judges 10:2
verses.text: And he judged Israel twenty and three years, and died, and was buried in Shamir.

verses.name: Judges 10:3
verses.text: And after him arose Jair, a Gileadite, and judged Israel twenty and two years.

verses.name: Judges 10:4
verses.text: And he had thirty sons that rode on thirty ass colts, and they had thirty cities, which are called Havoth–jair unto this day, which are in the land of Gilead.

verses.name: Judges 10:5
verses.text: And Jair died, and was buried in Camon.
